original: 啟稟大人，<color=#fff999>$leader1</color>婉拒了我軍招募，想必是計策已被看穿，屬下真是無地自容。(<color=#bceea7>招募失敗</color>)
text: Master Qi, <color=#fff999>$leader1</color> declined the recruitment of our army. It must be that the strategy has been seen through, and the subordinates are really embarrassed. (<color=#bceea7>Recruitment failed</color>)
